item.title: South Dakota Code Camp 2013
item.author: tyler.harms@gmail.com (Tyler Harms)
item.description: I would say that South Dakota Code Camp 2013 was another huge success. The organizers were once again able to find some great speakers that cover a wide array of topics. Moreover, this year I had the opportunity to speak. I chose to speak about Django, one of my favorite web frameworks. Anyway, here is a link to my slides.
